properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 29 at 3:26PM EST until January 30 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 3 to 5 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River SC to Savannah GA out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
